summary:
since halloween is right around the corner, imagine the post-thanos halloween superhero-themed party at the compound:
Tony is...
body:
since halloween is right around the corner, imagine the post-thanos halloween superhero-themed party at the compound:

Tony is wearing a captain america uniform and a t-shirt over it that says “Tony Stark is my Hero”, steve is just in his normal clothes except for his shirt that says “*Stank” in big bold letters, and peter takes a picture of the two standing together, laughing abiut something, and of course it goes viral once he posts it.

Clint is wearing an apron that says “the earth might be closed but the cook’s legs aint” and yellow cleaning gloves, walking around with a broom and a dustpan occasionally yelling the names of the avengers that dusted like “BuckY?? Saaaam? I came to pick you up!”

Natasha is wearing a shirt that says 20/20 and no one understands why until Vision arrives later and she stands next to him dead-silent and everyone loses their fucking minds.

brunhilde came for the free booze, thor is talking to bruce and they’re both dressed as each other and claiming to be ‘the strongest avenger’ in an annoying childish voice.

Sam is claiming to be an eligible goth girlfriend but all he’s wearing is bucky’s red henley and a shitton of eyeliner.

bonus: peter says how he likes bucky’s costume (a full-blown falcon uniform with a huge post it note that says “Pigeon” on his chest) and bucky doesnt respond at first, until he goes “why did you dress up as me” and peter goes “cause youre really cool mr. white wolf” and bucky goes “but im not even a hero” and peter goes “my history textbook and the walmart superhero costume section say otherwise” and the kid just shrugs as if he didnt make bucky’s entire goddamn day.

blog.name: closertolightgreateryourshadow
blog.title: Team Iron Man!
blog.description: Fandoms: Kingdom Hearts, Legend of Zelda, Rwby, Leverage, Merlin.

body:
Nostalgic Avengers

So I was going through all my Stony bookmarks and gods, I miss early Avengers headcanons. Just after The Avengers came out in 2012, everyone was writing about how the Avengers would drift back to Stark/Avengers Tower after they split at the end of Avengers and I just…really miss the optimism in the wake of the first movie. Oh, they’ll split up for their own movies but they’ll come back together and nerd it up in Avengers Tower between those. And that’s not what happened at all. Everyone thought that fighting the Battle of New York would bind the Avengers together, that they would realize hey, we’re awesome together, we should keep doing this team thing… and the state the team and fandom is in now? It really fucking blows how far back we’ve come from the wake of the first Avengers movie.

I want Hawkeye creeping around the vents. I want Thor thinking Poptarts are the best thing ever. I want Natasha leaving knives in every room. I want Bruce drinking really obscure teas. I want Tony going on workshop binges to improve all the team’s gear. I want Steve to realize that he could have a life that’s not mission after mission. I want the whole team holding movie night to catch Steve up on pop culture.

I want the Avengers we thought we were getting after the first movie instead of this sorry state we’re in now.

Oh, they’ll split up for their own movies but they’ll come back together and nerd it up in Avengers Tower between those. And that’s not what happened at all. Everyone thought that fighting the Battle of New York would bind the Avengers together, that they would realize hey, we’re awesome together, we should keep doing this team thing… and the state the team and fandom is in now? blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: A House Divided is Ticked Off
title: A House Divided is Ticked Off
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2vYMyDv

by CanuckleheadCowgirl, magnetocerebro

You’d think that after the X-Men got rid of Sinister, things would be looking up, right?

Well, maybe not so much.

The first sign of trouble comes from a mysterious gift given to Scott Summers and his wife, Annie, when they have their second son, Cody. But when Scott goes to investigate it, what follows is a long string of trouble from telepaths and other manipulators determined to get their claws in the X-Men one way or another.

And if that wasn’t bad enough, the bad guys seem to be making it a point to break up the family happiness that’s been going on, including some sweet junior X-Men who have done nothing to deserve this nonsense.

But that’s how life in Westchester goes: If you’re not fighting a war, you’re fighting to keep from being a weapon in someone else’s war.

Words: 3673, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 19 of The 714 Marvel Universe

  • Fandoms: Avengers (Comics), X-Men (Comicverse), Marvel (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Gen
  • Characters: Scott Summers, Logan (X-Men), Kate Bishop, Kurt Wagner, Annie Hale (OC), K (OC), Tyler Creed (OC), Tamara Allen (OC), Rachel Summers, Tony Stark, Noh-Varr, Jubilee, Emma Frost, Purple Man, Chance Summers (OC), Charlie Summers (OC), Krissy Wagner (OC), Elin Howlett (OC), James Howlett Jr. (OC), Sying-Varr (OC)
  • Relationships: Scott Summers/Annie Hale (OC), Noh-Varr/Jubilee, Kurt Wagner/Kate Bishop, Logan/K(OC), Tyler Creed (OC)/Tamara Allen (OC)
  • Additional Tags: Lots of OCs - Freeform, but we love them all, especially the babies, all the babies, BABY X-MEN, anti-scemma, seriously Emma just stay away


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2vYMyDv

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Not Alone Anymore
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2nRbXdN

by notapartytrick

The jarring sound of Tony’s first name being spoken by a high-pitched voice jerked him out of the darkness with a gasp.
Looking wildly around for the source of the voice, he saw a rectangle of light streaming in from the open door of his room. A gangly shadow was pressed against the doorway.
Suddenly, Tony was all too aware of the sweat pooling in his collarbone and running down his back, sticking his t-shirt to his back, and his erratic breathing. He was sprawled on the floor.
Wait, the floor? Why?
Shit. Not in front of the kid-
Peter had a huge navy blue sweater on; he pulled at the hem with frantic fingers. Staring intently at Tony, assessing, he whispered, “What happened?”
Tony’s head was still spinning. “How long have you been there?” Hurriedly, he raised himself up onto his elbows, sucking in a breath that sounded more like a learner driver changing gear.
“A couple minutes,” Peter mumbled. He seemed to be deliberating over whether to cross the threshold of Tony’s room.“You – you wouldn’t wake up, Mr. Stark.”

Words: 3095, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Fluff and Angst, Panic Attacks, Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Irondad, spiderson, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Whump, Hair Kink, Platonic Cuddling, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Recovery, Flashbacks, One Shot, Hurt/Comfort, Precious Peter Parker, Peter Parker helps Tony Stark, Post- Snap, Tony Stark loves Pater Parker, Peter Parker Loves Tony Stark, Peter Parker Knows How to Stop a Panic Attack, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, arm writing, Those Lost in The Snap Come Back, Post-Peter Parker’s Death, Guessing What Happened in Avengers 4, Lots of Infinity War References, Why Did I Write This?, I’m so so sorry, I cried writing this, why

trail.content:

by notapartytrick

The jarring sound of Tony’s first name being spoken by a high-pitched voice jerked him out of the darkness with a gasp.
Looking wildly around for the source of the voice, he saw a rectangle of light streaming in from the open door of his room. A gangly shadow was pressed against the doorway.
Suddenly, Tony was all too aware of the sweat pooling in his collarbone and running down his back, sticking his t-shirt to his back, and his erratic breathing. He was sprawled on the floor.
Wait, the floor? Why?
Shit. Not in front of the kid-
Peter had a huge navy blue sweater on; he pulled at the hem with frantic fingers. Staring intently at Tony, assessing, he whispered, “What happened?”
Tony’s head was still spinning. “How long have you been there?” Hurriedly, he raised himself up onto his elbows, sucking in a breath that sounded more like a learner driver changing gear.
“A couple minutes,” Peter mumbled. He seemed to be deliberating over whether to cross the threshold of Tony’s room.“You – you wouldn’t wake up, Mr. Stark.”

summary: I LIVE for short male characters that are also total badasses.  Like, character A is lethal warrior. He is the embodiment of...
body:
I LIVE for short male characters that are also total badasses. 

Like, character A is lethal warrior. He is the embodiment of intimidation. He is awesome, suave, cool, powerful, he will fuck your ass up without batting an eyelash, and he’s like 5′7′’.

Tony: You’re not the boss of me

When does “you’ll get over it” begin?

And what if I still am not truly over

What am I supposed to do then?

When can I see you again?

blog.description: Hate mail always accepted, if you're blocked 99% chance you blocked first ask and I may unblock. Tumble dad to many but daddy to none  and that's just fine by me           Icon by @weaponizedhorse, Background image by @sini-sterility

blog.name: platonicironmanimagines
blog.title: Platonic Iron Man Imagines
blog.description: "I'm the best."  Because having Tony Stark as a best friend would be a chaotic, insane, and mildly entertaining experience. I just write for him.

summary: Tony reacting to friend dating Loki?
question: Tony reacting to friend dating Loki?
answer:
• a literal spittake
  • like that old internet meme of that guy eating cereal
  • “yeah, and i’m dating ted cruz. sorry, what? care to repeat that?”
  • “tony, I’m dating loki.”
  • and half of it is just disbelief–like, loki loki? like, i killed hundreds of people in the middle of new york loki? like, part of the reason why tony’s so paranoid loki? 
  • he’s not as psyched as you’d think
  • give him literally anyone else except maybe bucky because there’s some bad blood there too and he’d be fine–supportive even, but
  • “listen, y/n, you can’t fall for his whole draco-in-leather-pants mien. it’s not a whole ‘sure, he’s done some bad in his past but all he needs is love’ bs. you don’t excuse actions like–like what he did. he’s destructive. he did it because he didn’t think his family loved him, and it wasn’t just a small blow-up–do you understand?”
  • of course, you’re reasonably pissed and sad because it’s not like you told him so he could lecture you
    • and you understand that he’s just looking out for you and there’s tension between the two anyways but
    • but you told him because you were best friends, and you didn’t want to have to keep anything from him
  • when tony realizes it’s about trust, he calms down a bit, though he’s still reasonably skeptic
  • it’s clear for a long time that he doesn’t necessarily support it but he respects you enough to be devoid of a response
  • one day, he and loki meet and tony’s a little shrewd in the overly-sarcastic, funny but infuriating way of his with loki
  • but eventually, they sort it out
  • and things are never perfectly okay, but tony does end up casually teasing the dates between you two when he hears you’re going out
    • which is a good sign, and the best sign you’ll ever get from him
  • even the jokes between him and loki become more light-hearted over time
  • and things work out.
